meanings.definition: To surpass in performance or achievement.
meanings.sent1: She is outdoing her classmates in math.
meanings.sent2: The athlete is outdoing his personal best in the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel is outdoing the other animals in gathering nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to practice is outdoing her previous records.
meanings.sent5: The sun outdoing the moon in brightness.

meanings.definition: To excel or be superior to.
meanings.sent1: He is outdoing his siblings in playing the piano.
meanings.sent2: The company is outdoing its competitors in sales.
meanings.sent3: The cat is outdoing the dog in catching mice.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness is outdoing his generosity.
meanings.sent5: The river outdoing the stream in size.
